text.__SUMMARY__: Allium karataviense is an Asian species of onion in the Amaryllis family.It is a native to central Asia (Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Afghanistan) (and cultivated elsewhere as an ornamental plant.). It has been selected for the Great Plant Picks list of outstanding plants for the maritime Pacific Northwest.
text.Description:
Allium karataviense is an herbaceous, bulb-forming species. It produces a basal rosette of wide, arching leaves.
